item.title: 印度外卖平台 Swiggy 批准通过 QIP 募集高达 1,000 亿卢比资金
item.description: 印度食品和杂货配送公司 Swiggy 周五表示，其董事会批准了通过合格机构配售（QIP）筹集最多 1,000 亿卢比（11.4 亿美元）资金的计划，以充实资本，促进增长。【原文：Indian food and grocery delivery firm Swiggy on Friday said its board approved plans to raise up to 100 billion rupees($1.14 billion) via qualified institutional placement (QIP) as it seeks to shore up capital for growth.】

item.title: 法国政府为邮政与中国特木公司的协议辩护
item.description: 法国商务部长周五为法国国有邮政服务公司与中国电子商务网站特木网最近达成的一项协议进行了辩护。【原文：France's commerce minister on Friday defended a recent deal between the state-owned postal service and Chinese ecommerce site Temu, agreed just weeks before the Paris prosecutor launched an investigation into several online marketplaces.】

item.title: 随着扭亏为盈战略取得进展，Peloton 股价大涨
item.description: Peloton Interactive 周五在盘前交易中股价大涨超过 7%，此前这家健身公司的季度营收超过预期，这主要得益于其改良产品阵容的早期吸引力以及硬件和订阅价格的上涨，增强了投资者对其扭亏为盈战略的信心。【原文：Peloton Interactive shares jumped more than 7% in premarket trading on Friday after the fitness company beat quarterly revenue estimates, buoyed by early traction from its revamped product lineup and price hikes across hardware and subscriptions, reinforcing investor confidence in its turnaround strategy.】

item.title: DeepSeek 研究员对人工智能的影响持悲观态度，这是这家初创公司成功后首次公开露面
item.description: 中国人工智能（AI）开发商深鉴科技（DeepSeek）在轰动全球近一年后首次公开露面，现场一位高级研究员在政府组织的互联网会议上表示，他对人工智能未来对人类的影响持悲观态度。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) developer DeepSeek made its first public appearance in almost a year after it became a global sensation, fielding a senior researcher who told a government-organised internet conference that he was pessimistic about AI's future impact on humanity.】

item.title: 联合国粮农组织称 10 月份世界粮食价格连续第二个月下降
item.description: 联合国粮食及农业组织周五表示，10月份世界粮食商品价格连续第二个月下跌，主要原因是全球供应充足。【原文：World food commodity prices fell for a second consecutive month in October, driven largely by ample global supplies, the United Nations' Food and Agriculture Organization said on Friday.】

item.title: 奥莫维奥公司首席执行官表示，Nexperia 芯片供应紧张已获出口豁免
item.description: 德国奥莫维奥公司（Aumovio）的首席执行官周五表示，该公司是在Nexperia事件中面临供应链压力的汽车供应商之一，已获得中国的豁免，可以恢复出口该公司的芯片。【原文：Germany's Aumovio , one of the automotive suppliers facing pressure on its supply chains in the spat over Nexperia, has received an exemption from China to resume exports of the company's chips, its chief executive said on Friday.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，台湾 10 月出口创近 16 年最大增幅
item.description: 由于对芯片和人工智能（AI）技术的蓬勃需求超过了美国对台湾商品征收关税的影响，台湾 10 月份的出口增长创下了近 16 年来的最快纪录。【原文：Taiwan's exports grew at their fastest clip in nearly 16 years in October, setting a record as booming demand for chips and artificial intelligence (AI) technology outpaces the effects of U.S. tariffs on the island's goods.】

item.title: 与特朗普达成削减肥胖症药物价格的协议后，诺和诺德股价下跌
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）周五开盘时股价下跌，此前该公司与竞争对手礼来（Eli Lilly）在周四晚些时候与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成了一项协议，以降低其GLP-1减肥药的价格。【原文：Shares in Novo Nordisk fell at opening on Friday, after the Wegovy-maker and rival Eli Lilly struck a deal late on Thursday with U.S. President Donald Trump to slash prices of their GLP-1 weight-loss drugs.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，本田将因车轮脱落问题召回超过 40.6 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周五表示，本田公司将在美国召回406290辆装有铝合金车轮的汽车，这些车轮作为配件出售，由于生产错误，车轮可能会从汽车上脱落。【原文：Honda is recalling 406,290 vehicles in the U.S. that have aluminium alloy wheels sold as accessories as the wheel may detach from the vehicle due to a manufacturing error, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.】

item.title: 马斯克预计特斯拉的全自动驾驶软件将于 2026 年初在中国获得全面批准
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他预计该公司的全自动驾驶软件（一种驾驶辅助系统）将于明年年初在中国获得全面批准。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said he expects the automaker's Full Self-Driving software, a driver assistance system, will be fully approved in China early next year.】

item.title: 独家报道中国开始放宽稀土出口规定，但与特朗普的希望相差甚远
item.description: 业内人士表示，中国已开始设计新的稀土许可制度，该制度可能会加快稀土的运输，但不可能像华盛顿所希望的那样完全取消限制。【原文：China has begun designing a new rare earth licensing regime that could speed up shipments, but it is unlikely to amount to a complete rollback of restrictions as hoped by Washington, industry insiders said.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯：美联储可能很快需要扩大资产负债表以满足流动性需求
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周五表示，该央行上周决定停止缩减债券存量，可能很快就需要通过购买债券来增加资产负债表。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said on Friday that the central bank, which last week decided to stop shrinking its stock of bonds, may soon need to grow its balance sheet through bond purchases.】

item.title: 贝恩资本私人信贷高管撇开系统性担忧，放眼亚洲发展
item.description: 贝恩资本私人信贷部的一位高级主管告诉路透社，全球私人信贷市场目前没有系统性风险，而亚洲则提供了最大的增长机会。【原文：The global private credit market currently has no systemic risks, while Asia offers the biggest growth opportunities, a senior Bain Capital private credit executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，如果芯片供应恢复，荷兰准备放弃对 Nexperia 的控制权
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，如果中国恢复关键芯片的出口，荷兰政府准备搁置赋予其阻止或改变芯片制造商 Nexperia 关键公司决策的权力的命令。【原文：The Dutch government is ready to shelve the order that gave it power to block or change key corporate decisions at chipmaker Nexperia if China resumes exports of critical chips, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃达丰、AST SpaceMobile 将建立欧洲主导的卫星星座
item.description: 沃达丰和 AST SpaceMobile 周五公布了一项计划，将建立一个由欧洲主导的卫星星座，为商业和政府应用提供卫星到智能手机的连接。【原文：Vodafone and AST SpaceMobile on Friday unveiled plans to establish a Europe-led satellite constellation to provide satellite-to-smartphone connectivity for commercial and government applications.】

item.title: ITV 正在与康卡斯特旗下的天空电视台洽谈 21.5 亿美元的媒体部门出售事宜
item.description: ITV 周五表示，它正在与康卡斯特（Comcast）旗下的天空电视台（Sky）就可能以 16 亿英镑（21.5 亿美元）（包括债务）的价格出售这家英国广播公司的媒体和娱乐部门进行谈判。【原文：ITV said on Friday it was talks with Sky, owned by Comcast , over a potential sale of the British broadcaster's media and entertainment unit for 1.6 billion pounds ($2.15 billion) including debt.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Anthropic 拓展欧洲市场，在巴黎和慕尼黑设立办事处
item.description: 美国人工智能初创公司Anthropic周五表示，它正计划将业务扩展到整个欧洲，并在法国首都巴黎和德国慕尼黑开设办事处。【原文：U.S. AI startup Anthropic said on Friday it was planning to expand its operations across Europe, and open offices in the French capital Paris and Munich in Germany.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称公司不打算向中国发货
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周五在抵达台南市进行他今年第四次公开访问台湾时表示，这家美国人工智能芯片制造商不打算向中国运送任何产品，但希望未来能再次为中国市场提供服务。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Friday, upon arriving in the city of Tainan for his fourth public visit to Taiwan this year, that the U.S. AI chipmaker did not plan to ship anything to China but hoped to serve the Chinese market again in the future.】

item.title: 本田在第二季度业绩下滑后削减年度营业利润
item.description: 本田汽车周五将其年度利润预期下调了约五分之一，并公布其第二季度营业利润下降了 25%，原因是其业绩受到了美国进口关税和与电动汽车相关的一次性成本的打击。【原文：Honda Motor cut its annual profit forecast by about a fifth and posted a 25% drop in its second-quarter operating profit on Friday, as its performance took a hit from U.S. import tariffs and one-off costs related to electric vehicles.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司季度利润下降 40%，但维持全年预期
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司周五报告称，第三季度营业利润下降了 40%，降幅高于预期，但由于欧洲市场的积极势头和北美市场的复苏，该公司仍坚持其年度预测。【原文：Daimler Truck reported a bigger-than-expected 40% drop in third-quarter operating profit on Friday, but stuck to its annual forecasts on the back of a positive momentum in Europe and a recovery in North America.】

item.title: 三星电子任命关键决策机构新负责人
item.description: 三星电子周五表示，已任命 Park Hark-kyu 为其业务支持办公室的新负责人，该办公室是这家科技巨头的重要决策机构，为董事长李在镕提供服务。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Friday it had named Park Hark-kyu as the new head of its business support office, a key decision-making body of the technology giant that serves chairman Jay Y. Lee.】

item.title: 早间竞标人工智能可能还没完
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 美国关税可能使日本陷入六个季度以来的首次经济萎缩：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，在受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策打击后，日本经济在7-9月份可能出现了六个季度以来的首次萎缩。【原文：Japan's economy probably contracted for the first time in six quarters in the July-September period after being battered by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：面对美国和大型科技公司的压力，欧盟权衡暂停具有里程碑意义的人工智能法案的部分内容
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，在大型科技公司和美国政府的强大压力下，欧盟委员会正在提议暂停实施其具有里程碑意义的人工智能法律的部分内容。【原文：The European Commission is proposing a pause to parts of its landmark artificial intelligence laws amid intense pressure from big tech companies and the U.S. government, Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行不会就裁员失利提起上诉
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac）的一位发言人表示，该行在强制一名员工每周两次到办公室上班的案件中败诉，因此不会对劳工法庭的裁决提起上诉。【原文：Australian bank Westpac will not appeal a labour tribunal ruling after it lost a case to compel one of its workers to be in the office twice a week, according to a bank spokesperson.】

item.title: 日本投资者因对美联储言论和估值担忧持谨慎态度而抛售外国股票
item.description: 截至11月1日的一周内，日本投资者大量减持外国股票，因为他们在美国联邦储备委员会一些官员发表鹰派言论后转为谨慎，并倾向于在近期市场反弹后锁定利润。【原文：Japanese investors divested significant holdings in foreign stocks in the week to November 1, as they turned cautious amid hawkish remarks from some U.S. Federal Reserve officials and favoured locking in profits after the recent market rally.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣表示，日本政府将支持大银行发行稳定币的项目
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山聪树周五表示，日本金融厅已决定支持日本三大银行联合发行稳定币的项目。【原文：Japan's Financial Services Agency has decided to support a project by the country's three largest banks to jointly issue stablecoins, Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama said on Friday.】

item.title: 新加坡电信出售约 12 亿美元的印度巴帝电信股份
item.description: 新加坡电信公司（Singapore Telecommunications）周五表示，该公司以 15 亿新元（11.6 亿美元）的价格出售了印度第二大移动运营商 Bharti Airtel 0.8% 的股份。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications said on Friday its unit sold a 0.8% stake in India's second-largest mobile carrier Bharti Airtel for S$1.5 billion ($1.16 billion).】

item.title: 日本首相高市让大手大脚的拥护者担任小组成员
item.description: 日本主张扩张性财政政策的通货再膨胀主义者在经济决策中卷土重来，其中一些人被首相高市真奈钦点担任政府重要部门的职务。【原文：Japan's reflationist advocates of expansionary fiscal policy are making a comeback in economic decision-making with some hand-picked by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi to fill posts in key government panels.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，约 15,000 名用户的 Apple TV 出现故障
item.description: 据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周四美国有近 14907 名用户的苹果流媒体服务 Apple TV 出现故障。【原文：Apple's streaming service Apple TV was down for nearly 14,907 users in the U.S. on Thursday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】
